General.Name: TAPEX INC
General.Description: Tapex Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells adhesive tapes in South Korea. The company provides various tapes that are used in the areas of electronic products, including flat panel displays, semiconductors, secondary batteries, optic lens moldings, electronic insulations, electrical fittings, (F) PCBs, and touch panels, as well as for EMI shielding, lead frame plating, and other applications; packing applications; and in home/office products, such as kitchen utensils, tapes, and household items. It also exports its products to approximately 10 countries. The company was formerly known as Seotong Chemical Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Hwaseong-si, South Korea.
